PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Asian School of Tea provides Training Courses on Tea. This website is made on HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Framework and Javascript. A plugin has been used to embed the Instagram account. This website has gone under several changes over time. I have worked on the home page and most of the inner pages.

Nostealgia is a small venture in Indian and Nepalese tea. This website is made on HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Framework and Javascript. A plugin has been used to embed Instagram in this website. I have worked on the homepage and some of the inner pages of this website.

Jameen is an online source for buying, selling and investing in land and warehouses in West Bengal.  This is an app landing page. This website is made from scratch using HTML, SCSS, Javascript, Bootstrap Framework and FSSScroll.js plugin. The blog page is made on WordPress.  I have worked on the homepage and inner pages of this website.

Voice Prescription was one of the problem statements provided by Bajaj FIn for SIH 2020. In this, we needed to convert the audio speech into text for doctor's prescription. I have worked on the frontend part of this project.

Santieb’s is a Luxury Lifestyle Brand Specializing in Parfum. I have worked on the modification of the different pages of this website. This is a WordPress website using flatsome theme. This website has been co-created with my colleague.

SES is an E-Vehicle manufacturing company. seselectric.in is its official website. This website is made from scratch using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Framework and Javascript. I have worked on the homepage and inner pages of this website.
Creceras is a website development and digital marketing company. This website is made on WordPress using WP Bakery Builder. I have worked on the homepage and inner pages of the website.
Credence is a personal financial firm. This website is made on HTML, CSS, Bootstrap framework and Javascript. I have worked on the homepage of this website.

Prince tea is the highest quality Black and Orthodox (Long leaf) tea seller. This website is made from scratch using HTML, SCSS, Javascript and Bootstrap framework. A Horizontal js plugin is also used on this website. I have worked on the homepage and inner pages of this website.

Aminia is not one of the chains of traditional aminia restaurants. The first outlet was opened in 1929. This website is made from scratch on HTML, SCSS, Bootstrap Framework and Javascript. I have worked on most of the sections of this website. The completion of this project was done by my colleague.
Toparts is a safety apparel manufacturing company. This website is made on Wordpress using flatsome theme. I have worked on the homepage and inner pages of this website.

A N John is one of the most renowned salon and academy company of Kolkata having multiple branches at different parts of the city. I had the opportunity to work on the inner pages of this website and make this website responsive.

I have worked on the inner pages and responsiveness of the page. This is the traditional Aminia which has it's branches all over the city and is soon going to open one in Dubai. Aminia at New Market is one of its branches.

ATA Ventures work in different fields from providing internships and training to students to performing different exams. This website is made on HTML, CSS, Bootstrap framework and Javascript. I have worked on the homepage and inner pages of the website.

American Waffle House is one of the leading waffle selling companies in the country. americanwafflehouse.com is its official website. This website is made from scratch using HTML, SCSS, Javascript and Bootstrap framework.  I have worked on the homepage of this website.
